text:
Yo bhaiiii
Kaise hamesha smile ker lete ho bhai. 
Ek time per to mai tumhara first name hi bhul gya tha. Yearbook mei although first name se search kiya haiüòå
Bhai mujhe to first year wali memory bhulti hi nhi. Jab tum poori raat ghis ke room per aate the practice ke baad. Uske baad Galaxy tk dance kiya. Bhai aaya tha tumhara dance dekhne Antaragni mei. Fir Galaxy dance battle mei cheer hi kiya tha. Kya hero moment tha tumhare liye. 
Beshak bahut mehnat ki hai bhai tumne. Aur end to kya shaandar raha hai. 
Pulkit aur mai itne khush the jab tumhari naukri ki khabar suni. Aur fir CTC bhi badhwa liya. All's well that ends well. Right.
Apna association to ek family wala hai bhai. Bhulna mat. Milte rehna. 
Btw bombay is love. Bombay is dope. Bombay ke liye respect!

Byee bhai
Best wishes
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Well I do remember you from the awaazein jo aati thi while you would be attending calls or mai room mei baitha rehta tha. And I am not a visitor.

Kabhi content per itna dhyan nhi diya per call ke end mei yahi lagta tha ki you cracked it. Hamesha ek bahut hi mature vibe aai tumse. Can't forget that night jab Hall mei SIS aaye the aur Ramola bhand hoke so gaya tha. Saale ko yaad bhi nhi hoga. Uss din kaafi help ker di thi tumne else ham sab SSAC jaa rhe the. Jaisa mahaul tha campus ka ek sem drop bhi le hi lete. 

Apne set ke achievements rahe hai bhai tumhare. Jisne bhi tumhare saath kaam kiya hai unse acha hi suna hai tumhare baare mei. To bakchod to ho.
Milte rehna bhai. Best wishes!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Aman bhaii
Mere liye to real geek definition mei tum hi aaoge ab zindagi bhar. From that first day when you asked about P-club to one of the wing baapu to the end of first semester when you didn't actually need a P-club. 
How can I forget that it was you who typed and proof read my manifesto. Sorry disappoint ker diya end result se:(
Jitni mature tumhari awaaz hai utne hi tum. Jab bhi mile ek comfort aur homie wali vibe aayi. Allahabad zyada dur nhi hai to ye vibe share kerne aa jaunga jab man karega. Welcome ker lena.
Baaki aane wale times ke liye all the best bhai! Do not settle for less. College couldn't really sense your potential. I won't take the high ground of saying that I could but still this is how I feel. Chaap do! 
I liked jo tum aksar watch pehne hue dikh jaate the. Cool vibes you see!
Bye bhai!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Yo Ananya!
First of all I was gonna write this one. Its just that you got to my feed first. Believe me for that!

Pata nhi kyu but pehli cheez jo hamesha click kerti hai is about our mutual connect on bitching about Shashank Shekhar. And still we chose his elective. 
ESO208 wasssss. I don't know what to say. Thanks for those answers which landed you in trouble üò¨. But yeah all's well that ends well.
Jokes apart that organ donation talk was one huge initiative. I wish agla summer campus mei milta to use kaafi aage badha sakte the. 
Nevertheless I wish we had interacted more but then that's how life is.
Special mention to your 'As we leave'. I wish you had written more about sexism thing. I could resonate with you. But then it do opens up ways for some other coffee chat. Some other place, some other time. Make sure it happens
Best wishes!
Tatas!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Yo Baldip 
I hope ab tak to tumne apno Punjabi achi ker logi.
Kya sahi discussions hote the bhai apne. Tumhare debsoc jaane ka to maine khoob fayda uthaya hai. 
How can I forget those wing sessions jismein ek time ke baad tumne wo nirvana stage achieve ker li thi. Haa maaro meri dekhe kitna maar sakte. However things were, deep down everyone respects you. Itna mujhe bharosa hai.
Waapis aao to milte hain. Baaki mujhe zyada ummeed hai nhi ki India mei rahoge. To jaha bhi rahoge waha ki annual trip to maar hi lunga tumhare hote hue. 
Bye dost! See you soon
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Oh just noticed that email I'd. 
1983. Respect++
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Yo Comrade!
I always made explicit effort to spell and pronounce that 'h' in your name. So you see I am peculiar with details.

To the man from the place I wish I was born in,
Your art work and creativity is a legacy that coming batches will cherish upon. We all have at some point worn a T-shirt designed by you,  featured in a video edited by you, or in my case represented a pool which is highly indebted to you for its glorious Galaxy2020 win.

I badly long for those first year days when we would sit at your room and enjoy malayalam classics. Thanks for introducing me to it and making me fall in love with Kerala.(even more). 
Sad part is it didn't last long since you find solace in other gas and roll stuffs. (Sighs)

I will come to Kerala someday my friend. Just promise me that you would host and make that visit a worthy one. Might plan on buying some land and living there. So you see I am serious. 

[That chicken dish on malayalam food counter in Antaragni was awesome. Waisa aur bhi taste kerna hai]

I regret that we could have been more intimate friends then what we are now.  As rightly said Art transcends boundaries, so does the red flag. So Gowtham I hope we live long enough to form a stronger bond. I wish I live long enough to see your art make history. 
In this tiny cage of our insecurities you my friend are soaring high. Never let that thought get rid of you.
Best wishes. 
See you soon !
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Glad we met!
Honesty likhu to first meet per bhi nhi laga ki hum pehli baar mil rhe. Either it was your vibe or we did connect organically. Can't say sahi kaun sa hai. Will have to see how you vibe with others on your first meet :P
Well, not every effort's success is to be measured via the end result. Many a times process itself is quite regarding. You deciding to contest was one such decision.  Else mujhe to koi intersecting paths nhi dikh rhe the yaar.
Honestly likhu to tumhare sath aane ka main reason yahi tha ki you were challenging the status quo at so many levels. Team-club, SnT mei girl candidate and what not. Would love and be satisfied if you promise to carry this along in your other pursuits too. Some big ones. Possible hua to fir saath aa jaunga. 
Milne ki ek tamanna hai jo badi lambi hai. Isse hi excitement build ho jata ki kitna kuch hoga humare paas baat kerne ko.  Tum bhi thodi excitement dikha dena yaar. Milte rehna. 
Zindagi lambi hai(hopefully). It's good to have people around jo ek above par buzz de dete hon milne per. Tumhare sath wo raha. Dont wanna lose that.
Best wishes Inshu
Rock kerti raho!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
4th sem, January2019
Kuch 4-5 ladke Bhatia ke sath mere room per aate hain aur usmei se ek hote ho tum. Ye banda aake situation samjhata hai aur bolta hai gensec ke liye contest kerna hai mujhe. 
Rest jo hua wo to fir history hai. Kai naslein yaad rakhenge. Mehnat humne bhi ki thi bhai tumhare liye, kabhi bhul mat jana.
Summer was good. Jab mai ye memoir likh rha abhi bhi meri Facebook DP mei tum ho. That was one earned pic with the legend after the shared effort we put in.
Always felt that spark to do something whenever you were around. Since kuch time aur hai apne paas to milte hain bhai.
Mehnat karte raho.
All the best!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Are Krishna bhaii!! 
Sorry der se hu. 
Pehli cheez to yahi yaad aati hai ki HSS trophy jeete tum aur fir defend bhi ker liya. Kya solid launde taiyyar kiye hai tumne apne pool mei.
Jab bhi mile hamesha ek comfort aur relaxed wale vibe se mile. Iski khushi hamesha rahegi. Harsh tumhari aur meri achi banti thi. 
[Election lad jana chahiye tha lekin fir tumhare aur plans the]
Aage ke liye all the best bhai. Jo bhi chuno usmei badhiya karo bhai. Koshish kerna milte rehne ki jab bhi mauka mile. Mai apni taraf se ker lunga.
Tatas!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Are Kuldeeep
Kaafi live aadmi ho bhai. Campus laut ke ek koi addition hua hai to tum hi hoge. Baaki to jinse naata tha unke saath hi ghumte the. Naa chahte hue bhi iska shrey Shrey ko.de deta hun. 
Yaadein to tumne exhaustive form mei likh di bhai. Kuch mere liye bhi chhod diye hote. Mai yaha wo likh ke vida leta hu jo mujhe samajh mei aya.
Alag level per mehnati lagte ho bhai. Chehre maano khud iska nazeer ho. Bahut hi mauko per unlucky bhi rhe ho. Per har baar mehnat badhai hi hai. Ye ek foolproof tareeka hai bhai zindagi ka. Kuch bhi ho jae apni mehnat se tum zameen samtal ker hi loge. 
Zimmedariyon ka bojh bhi lagta hai tum per. Use tum khud ulajhne aur suljhane mei saksham ho. Mai to yahi kahunga ki sabke beech apne liye samay zarur nikalna. Khud ko bhi reward ker lena. 
Baaki rangeen to ho hi. Badhiya zindagi guzaar loge.
Best wishes bhai!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Kushagra bhaiii
Kitni aur kitni zyada labs ki hain saath mei. Har baar end tk kuch na kuch workout ker hi lete the hum dono. Best was the ESC lab. Kyunki usmei hum dono kaafi hote the kaam bigadne ko.
Department mei to mera kya hi hota tum na hote to. Rona kerte the lekin fir end tk aake sambhal hi lete the. 
Lockdown ke baad tumhe ek alag cheerful mood mei dekha bhai. Iss Kushagra se mujhe aur milna hai. Luckily iss baar time hai. Aur ghoomte hain bhai sath mei.
Aage ke liye all the best! Mast ghumte raho aur jo bhi chuno usmein badhiya karo.
Bye bhai
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
No I don't know you by all that spamming. I know you in person. And I am glad that we came across. 
Bahut si textbook style achi cheezon mei vishwas aur sudridh ho gaya tumhare around rehne se.
Kya sahi secy tenure tha apna. But then you found your calling in CS. Still jab bhi milte the do baat ker hi lete the. Thanks for putting in those efforts. Sab nhi kerte. Per fir tum ‡§¶‡•Ä‡§™‡§ï ho. 

Sher padhte raho dost. Tumhari wajah se mera bhi daayra badha hai thanks to stories. Kabhi saath mei baithenge to samundar hi naap lenge. Ab jo hum peene bhi lage hain.

[Dickshaw on a rickshaw is my favourite till day]
Tumhari tareef in your absence, while Pulkit is around is another satisfactory act from college.

Best wishes bhai!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Hardikkkk
Pehle to bhai kitni cheezon ke liye thanks bolun!!
Kitne courses aur most importantly labs to tumne hi sambhali hai. Naveen Osama mai kaise tumhare room per aaker pad jaate the. Gurao wali lab to mai zindagi bhar nhi bhulne wala. 

Kaafi mehnati ho yaar tum. Tumhara around rehta tha to mai bhi effort dene lag jata tha dept mei. Bahut khushi hui thi jab tumhari job ka pata laga tha. Aise hi earned results cherish kerte raho bhai. 
[I did admire how you were so consistent with tennis without any apparent incentives]
Touch mei rehna bhai. Bhul mat jana. Kya pata fir zindagi koi sath mei project kerne ka mauka de de.
Tatas!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Teen cheezein aur phir vida
1) tumhare your quote wale event mei participate na ker paane ka malaal zindagi bhar rahega. Aur haath pair maarta to shayad samay se pahuch jaata.
2) itna pyaar kaha se laate ho. Jitni bhi memory har baar overpower ker liya hai tumne emotions se. 
3) as we leave se pata chala. Dekho dost risk lene se tum nhi darte ye to pata chal gaya. Duniya kya sochti hai isko bhi surpass ker liya hai. Masoom chehra bhi hai tumhare paas aur andar bahut saari acchai. Ab aur koi ingredients mujhe missing nhi lagta ki tum aane wali zindagi mei apne taiyyar kiye hue field mei chaap na do. jab bhi kabhi lage ki cheezin theek nhi jaa rhi in teeno ingredients ko cross check ker lena. Fir se track per aa hi Jaoge. 
Acha saath tha apna dost.  Milte rehna nahi likhunga. Ye vaada lunga ki effort ker loge tum touch mei rehne ki jab bhi zarurt hogi. 
Muskurate raho dost.
Good bye!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Hello dassa boi
Never would have imagined ye salutation likhne ke din aaenge. Nevertheless you have earned it.

First meeting yaad hai? Kaise tug of war chal rha tha and we both discovered hum same branch mei hain. Saale dono ek dusre ko bolte hain haan achi branch hai MSE. Uss din se MSE303 ka endsem. It has been quite a journey. 
Ruko thoda hans lun fir aage likhta hu.
I was amazed at how you could study at the last hour and still put up a decent performance( dimaag tez hai bas padhta nhi hai intensifies) aur fir baccha padha to macha hi diya. 
[Rohan ko milke tappa kehne mei kaafi maza aata tha ] 
Fir wo bhi time aaya jab tum wing mei kam dikhne lage aur dikhe to hardly kabhi akele dikhe. [La la la la la in bg]. Saath mei kiye gye assignments per haath rakhkar kehta hu, never intended to be a troublemaker. Ulta tumhe pitch bhi kiya tha maineüòå. Anyway all's well that ends well. 
I hope tum aage aane wale zindagi mei bhi itne hi stylish raho and as you have written, live life to the fullest. Khoob ghumo naacho dhoom machao dost( mandatory dhoom machale in bg).
Best wishes Pranav
Byee
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Hello Rosan,
Probably the only friend around who calls you by Pratyush and not Pattnaik.
Devnagri mei likhke tumse mehnat nahi karwaunga.  Isliye ek flow mei jo nikal rha use yaha darj ker de raha. 
Pehli mulaqat, first impression, lows and pretty more lows, exceptional highs, ek dusre ke liye pyaar ye sab reserve hai kisi Odiya lunch ke liye. Milte rahenge to baat kerte rahenge. Bhulna mat kuch bhi. Kitni hi unique cheezein yaha likhne ka man hai jo sirf mujhe aur tumhe samajh aayengi per nhi likhunga. Karz samajh lo. Jo lautkar nhi aaye iss April to usko cash-in kerna aur baari baari se milkar chukana. 
Mujhe ummeed hai ki jitne jokes college mei tumne mujhpar test kiye honge utne kisi aur per nahi. Agar meri ye ummeed sahi hai to mujhe isper fakr hai. Best of those were about local political leaders. Sala poore Bharat mei zameeni star(‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞) ka randaap ek sa hi hai. Kitni dafa to antar kerna mushkil ho jata tha ki sacchi ghatna byorit ker rhe ya chutiya kaat rahe. Nevertheless they were funny and pretty cheer enhancer. Rare breed hai aise wit ke saath roam around kerna. Request hai ki sambhal ker rakhna ise.
Time to spill out some serious shit and take your leave. I have always been someone who en routes emotions inwards and makes outbursts rare. I have been good at it. Tumhe dekhta hu to behtar paata hu khudse. Halanki samaaj iske vipreet mei hi rehta hai. Jo bhi andar ho use baahar nikaal do dil halka ho jaega jaisi philosophy. Per sab halka kerne mei lage rahenge  to bojh kaun uthayega. Isliye isper bhi mai yahi kahunga ki ise sambhal ker rakhna. Haa  mahila mitr tum banate hi rahoge. Soak out hota rahega ye sab. Mujhe wo bhi samay yaad ata hai jab kuch samay ke liye akele ho gye the. Tumhe suit nhi kerta. Aage zindagi mei ye tickbox bhara hi rakhna.
[Tum GPL ke samay moan bahut hi zanana tareeke se kerte ho.]
Khud President na ban paane ke liye kabhi kabhaar khud se zyada dukh mere liye tumhari baaton mei dikha. Yakeenan ye zyada disappointing hai. Khud ko to maine samjha liya tha. Per janmdin per aakar jo tumne kaha wo to lifelong regret list ka hissa ho gaya hai ab. Shayd tum kisi nashe mei chur the. Bhul gye ho to koi baat nahi.
Galaxy hum jeet gye. To tum aur Bhawan jis raat gaand marwa rhe the aur gaanja phunk rhe the uske liye sorry nahi bola hai. Jitesh aur mai intezaar mei hain.
Ab dekho dost, aur to nahi likha jaega mujhse. Yu nahi ki aalas aa rha per mujhe ummeed hai ki milkar (aur milte rehne per) hi unko jeeya jaae to behtar hai. Tummei ek na bhul paane wala vyaktitv hai. Convincing attribute at par hai. Zindagi mei jo bhi kerna isko full capitalise kerna. Baaki kabhi ‡§ó‡•Ç‡§¶‡•á ki kami mehsoos ho to yaad ker lena. Agar saksham raha to necessary push de dunga. 
Aazaad raho.
Yaad aati hai tumhari. Jitesh Krishna Mai Tum aur Pulkit ek acha homie group form kerte hain. Sab apne apne hisse ki mehnat karenge to lambe samay tak survive ker jaenge. Bas tum kisi star(haan wahi upar wala) per gaand mat marwa lena.
Milte rehna. 
Kabhi hurt kiya ho to bada dil dikhane ke liye shukriya. 

‡§ñ‡•Ç‡§¨ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞!
Chutiya Manish!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Priyanshu bhai
Ant se hi shuru ker deta hu. 
Bichhadne wale din ki subah bola tumne ki hum utna touch mei nhi rhe. Uss waqt to kuch kehke samjha le gaya mai. Shayd tumse zyada khud ko hi samjha rha tha. Ab palat ke dekho to lagta hai that's how life is. Samay rehte realise nhi hota.
Kabhi tumne efforts kiye hon reach out kerne ke aur mai lag kiya hu to sorry bhai.

Baaki to apne wing moments to bhar bhar ke rahe hi hain. So it's not all gloomy after all. Remember kaise tum HEC interested log mei aaye the aur fir nahi aaye. Ban jaate saale to kaafi kaam kerne ko milta saath mei. Nevertheless college ne kaafi kuch diya hai cheer up kerne ko. 
Ab raja beta to tum ban hi gye ho. Jald milte hain aur Sumukh ke plan ko use kerke tumhara shuddhikaran kerte hain. Fir se behosh ho peeke taaki iss baar bhi Rana aur mai tumhe utha ke(literally ) sula dein. Haa agli subah phir behosh hone ke liye.
All the best bhai
Milte hain!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§Ü‡§µ‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á ‡§§‡•á ‡§ï‡•á‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡•á‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§á‡§∏‡§® ‡§≠‡§á‡§≤ ‡§¨‡§æ ‡§¨‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§§‡•ã‡§π‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§á‡§∏‡§® ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ü‡§æ‡§™ ‡§¶‡•á‡§π‡§®‡•Ä‡•§ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡•ã‡§π‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡§≤ ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§î‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§ó‡§® ‡§∞‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•á‡§∞‡§æ ‡§§‡•Ç ‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•á ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§‡•á ‡§¨‡•ú‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§â‡§≤‡§Ö‡•§
[The evening we returned from Roorkee and you chose to order Pizza and we ate that. Was so full of guilt and could have cried that day. Something I decided that I am not letting this friend go, no.matter what] 
‡§¨‡•ù‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§á‡§π‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§â‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡•á‡§∞‡§æ ‡§§‡•Ç ‡§∏‡§π‡§ø‡§Ø‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ã‡§π‡§∞‡§æ *****‡§¶‡•ã[ because your Mom might read it some day] ‡§¨‡•ã‡§≤‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§° ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡•§ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¨‡§ï‡§ö‡•ã‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ò‡•Å‡§∏ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§ü ‡§≠‡§ø‡§§‡§∞‡•á ‡§Ö‡§â‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ó ‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ù‡•á ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•§ 
‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§æ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ù‡§æ‡§à ‡§è‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§π ‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•å‡§®‡•ã ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§õ‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§§‡•ã ‡§¶‡•á ‡§¶ ‡§§‡§®‡•Ä‡•§ ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ù‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§à ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã‡§π‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§õ‡•ã‡•ú‡§¨ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§Ç‡§¶‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§∞‡•§
[Helping people-Realising that they fuck off once things are set-Determining to not help again.(repeat). Activity 1 is who you really are. 3 is the thing you pretend.] 

Socks per sandal was one dope shit. 
Saying it to your face, you had one set of good looks jinki tumne care nhi ki. I know you didn't care enough to care. 

Pulkit mere bhai, zindagi badi hai. Kuch dikkaton mei ho. Paar tum paa hi loge. I expect you are yet to find your true calling. Iss process mei hum saath to rahenge hi. Bas college ke baad jab kabhi kahi chalne ko bolun to zyada dimaag mat lagana. Bag baandh lena aur chashma laga lena. Zindagi theek kaat lenge. 
Baaki tab tk fuck off bolna sikho. Selfish me says mujhe mat bolna bhai. Rest assured chaap dena. 

-
‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ò‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Rishabbbbb bhai!
Mere pyaare senator 
"I love exploring new things" Damn you do!
The guy jisne CC aur reading room ka poora istemaal kiya. Mai kaha kisi problem mei phansa rehta tha kuch kaam mei busy rehta tha aur tum har mahine ek naya game pick ker rhe hote the. 
Bag taang ke gym jana, fir kuch din baad pool khelne lag jana. Iss beech swimming gear mei bhi ho lena. Squash kaise bhul sakta hu.
Fir wo bhi din aaye jab tum "la la la la la" bhi kiye. Saale sab kuch to ker liya tumne in btech years. Sorry BS year mei.
But most importantly kya gajab acads sambhale hai tumne. Saamne wala room tha, kitni hi baar room khola aur tumhe padhte hue paya. Respect waise hi badh jaati thi.
Fir saale kuch chindi harkatein bhi ker dete ho. Wo sarojini nagar wali jeans (as Pratyush says), biceps flex, room per motivational posters. Lol. You were never a boring guy to hang out with.

Future plans to solid hain hi tumhare. Mujhe poora bharosa hai ki poore ker le jaoge. Whatever you have done in college, sabse khud ko better hi kiya hai tumne. 
[Tumhare maze lena, ya Rohan ko maze lete sunna is one of my wing's guilty pleasure]
Khoob maze karo bhai. Keep exploring 

Tatas!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Are Rohan!! Gaadi wala aaya ghar se kachra nikaaal
Duniya mei jhagadne ko itna kuch hai per fir duniya mei porn bhi hai. 
Ye memoir dedicated hai to our beloved Dani and our heart Rashmika.
Abse zindagi mei jab bhi ye memoir padho uss daur ki cult star ko in dono se compare zarur kerna. At least mai yaad aa jaunga. 
Kitne account share kerte hain hum, account irctc pingala. Ab next credit cards details share karenge ‚ò∫Ô∏è.
Helpful to tum ho hi. Hardly kabhi sochte hoge apne baare mei help kerne se pehle. 
[It is because of you jo fardeen khan se naam jud gya mera. üôÇüòñ]
Online course ki cpi hike. Hehe maja aaya
Ab jo dual ker rhe hain to at least MSE samjha le jaenge rishtedaron ko.
[Mai koi kattar hindu sher nhi hunüòë]
Sahi bond hai bhai apna. I genuinely feel college ke baad bhi chal jaega. Mehnat karte raho bhai. Bahut logon ka bhala kiya hai tumne. Sab laut ker aaega hi. Bas room khula rakhna. Band kerke Dani darshan shuru mat kerne lag jana. 

Milte hain. (Everytime when you read this memoir )
Byeess
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Sahil bhaiiii!!!
Kya shaandaar insaan ho tum. Don't know about others, but jab bhi mai milta tha to hamesha ek aur bhi calm mindset ke sath waapis room jaata tha. There is something intriguing about your smile. Somewhat restores faith that good things do exist. Can't explain. Ought not be.
Tumhara Galaxy dance aur dassa humne HEC mei jamke exploit kiya hai. So thanks for that.
Your bday party at the BBQ was one of the most memorable ones personally for me. 
Future self ki baat karein to we have our plans set right. Ditch mat kerna saaaleee. Bahut ummeedein hain. I know or better say we know, wingies ke liye kuch bhi karoge tum.
[Low-key mention: Pandey loves you!]

Bye bhaii. Khush raho. Bindass raho. Let the fun roll in!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Kya karun bas bye bhai likh ke chhod du kya.

Ab jo ki tumne decide ker hi liya hai to all the best! 
Bhai comic timing kya impeccable hai tumhari. Isi baat 2 samosa khareed ke kha lo.
Waise mujhe ummeed nhi thi ki cricket itna acha khel lete hoge. Per fir khel liye tum.
‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ mei bhi tumse itna ummeed nhi kiye the. Lekin usmein bhi surprise ker diye. 1 saal aur rukte to kuch aur mei bhi surprise ker hi dete. 
Baahar se hamesha bahut hi positive aadmi lage bhai. Aas paas hone mei hi abhaas ho jata tha. Phir andar gehre bhi lagte ho. Na jaane kya chhupae baithe ho.
Aage zindagi ke liye all the best bhai. Jo engineer first wala attitude hai usko kaayam rakhna bhai. Duniya engg hi chala rhe koi kuch bhi bole. Touch mei rehna. Mujhe poori ummeed hai tumhe jab bhi phone karunga saath mei hans hi lenge 
Mehnat karo bhai!
All the best!
Tatas!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Shivansh yaar!
Ek tareeka hai ki ye memoir mai taarif se bhar dun. Aur mere paas yaha college ke kisi ladke/ladki se zyada material hoga. 6 saal ho gae na dost.
Dusra tareeka hai ki khud ke liye jo filter out kiya hai tumhara dost hone se wo darj ker dun. 
SL Canteen mei baithe the. Semester shayd 3rd hoga. Discussion mei baat nikalkar aayi aur tumne kaha ki jo kaam at hand hai wo mere se nhi chhoda jata irrespective of aage kya kerna hai. Aaj tk wo bhul nhi paya hu. Koi wajah nhi dikhti ki aage bhulunga. You are man of your word or like that famous saying 'Its not who I am underneath but what I do that defines me'. Kitne kareeb ho iske tum.
Tumhara trek ke liye wo gaand phaad mehnat kerna ho ya fir Takneek mei hall captain ban jana. Winning hall captain I should say. Just has motivated me to push for things and just try out. No matter what our inhibitions are. So you see tumse motivate hone ke liye I don't have to be around. Ek hostel dur se hi tum radiate kerte ho.
Bio mei evolution ki baat likhi hai. So whosoever is reading that, lo mai yaha attest kerta hu ki iss bande ne wo kiya hai. From thar school guy who hardly find any solace in humans to this Shivanath who is leaving college with some really solid friendships. 
Just to remind ye sab kuch tareef nhi hai. Observations hain. Ab agar tareef sound ker rhe to tum ho hi itne chaapu.
Peene tum lage ho, gilaas mai bhi uthane laga hu. Can't see a reason ki sath mei Jack Daniels lekar na baithein. Soch ke hi mazaa aa jata hai. To jaldi jaldi jo goals liye hain unhe niptao aur mahaul banao.

Future you ke liye yahi likhunga ki ise padhte rehna, I hope it works as a reminder for you if by any chance (even iota of it) tumhe lage ki cheezein man mutabik nhi ho rhi. 
Rest assured I don't see a reason of losing contact. Special thanks for all those efforts you make just to give a call on festivals. May this be a binding factor for us 'to not lose contact'. Can't say what would happen if we stop celebrating festivals. Dekhte hain. Hopefully lamba jeeyein.
Dher saara respect aur dher saara pyaar. Dost
Take care!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Shobhit mere bhai!!
Still remember those orientation days when Bapu asked us to share our contacts. Aur tumhara no. as 'Shobhit bhai' save kiya maine. Can proudly claim ki aaj bhi contact name same hai. 
I have always felt that apna bond bahut special raha hai even though we have had months where we didn't talk. Thats how family is right. You don't have to make efforts to preserve it.
Some of the things which I really admire you for- 
It was this 2nd semester when you started those daily visits to CC just to practice coding. Shayd esc101 grades se satisfied nahi the tum. It would be around 5 in the evening jab mai CPA ke liye ready hota tha aur tumhe cycle utha ke jaate dekhta tha. Never said it to the face but that solo act did inspire me to push hard in other things I got involved with in life. 
Secondly, I just love how you are so loyal to your badminton racket. Things have gone upside down but tumne SAC visits nhi chhode. I have this feeling that 'commitment' is your forte, be it whatever playing field you choose. 
I am glad that 'CSE fever' tumhe nhi chadha unlike many of our batchmates. 
[You are just superb at mafia. Maasoom shakl ka poora fayda uthaya hai tumne]
Ek aur chiz likh deta hu so that tumhara memoir sweet simple jaise cheezon se na bhare. Shobhit Jagga mere bhai I have seen you around girls. How all your communication skills just open up and I see a new jagga around. Wit aur spontaneity pata nahi kahan se aa jati hai. Privileged that I know this side of you unlike many others. 
Having said all this I really regret that you went to a different wing. I wish I could have done something to prevent it. 
Chalo bhai, ab vida leta hun. Be the perfect mix of maturity and innocence that your are. Tumhara liye bahut sara pyaar. 
Yaad aaye to connect ki koshish kerte rehna. Mujhe to aayegi. And I promise main koshish bhi karunga 
Good bye!!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
MSE chhodne ke liye kabhi maaf nahi karunga. 
Sometimes I envy you for the state of chillness you have acquired in your pursuits. This also reminds me of the multiple discussions we have had around this with you sitting in the canteen. Haa it was you because jab bhi kabhi mai jata tha to tum pehle se waha milte the 2 samosa khate hue. Huge shoutout for not paying for the second one. On the face I had to be the canteen secy and oppose it just because I did not have the privilege to do so. 'Corruption allegations' you see. But you had that privilege. Another reason to turn envious. 
ENG437 was fun. I enjoyed reading your answers. Wish I could have read more of your writing. However I doubt if you ever wrote something just for the sake of writing. I like your style. Maybe if you would write more by breaching your chillness accord:/.
Alright I'll take your leave, unlike canteen I can't come back here to find you again. That's how things are in the end.
Given your state of 'chill' , I suppose it would have to be me who has to make efforts to reach out post college. Never mind I'll do so. However genuine efforts from your side would make it smooth. 
Take care dost! Khush rahi zindagi mei
Bye!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Bhaii kitne offbeat aadmi ho yaar tum
With that unique voice and unpredictable humour. Kabhi kabhi jokes itne forced, kabhi aise ki aadmi gir ke behosh ho jaae.
Ek uncalled for chull dekhi hai tum mei to do things which ought not to be done. Ek kism ka rebel to ye bhi hai.
Banae rakhna ise.
Milte hain jald!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Sourav mere bhai
First day of college and tum puchte ho. "Tu non-veg khata hai?" Confused me says "yes" and tum kehte ho chill hai ghar wale phone karein to unhe mat btana. Isse realise ho gaya ki it's just the kind of roomie I wanted. 
Bhai jaha wing mei jhagde ho rhe the roommates mei hum kya chill tareeke se rehte the. Hardly kabhi bother hue hoge tum. I can attest to the fact that ki agar aage bhi double room mei rehna padta to mai lad ke tumhe apna roomie banata.

Unlike popular opinion, I have seen you work hard over stuffs in my first year. Kaise TA labs aur MTH ke practice problem kerte the tum. Fir expected result na yield kerne per disappoint hote the. Fir zindagi mei aage badh jaate the. I really hope aage zindagi mei bhi yahi attitude rakho tum.
Over the years khud pe joke lene ki kya capacity badhai hai tumne. Just loved that. 
Materialistic cheezon ko lekar tumhari understanding kaabil e taarif hai dost. Hindsight mei kaafi seekha hai maine tumse uspe. 
Another attribute is that you are always keen on learning new things. However you want them quick. Thoda dheeraj rakho bhai. Aur bindass seekho. 
I believe aage aane wale time mei tum jo bhi pickup karoge usmein kabhi efforts ki kami nahi hone doge. Khoob mehnat karo dost. Make your name an international one. After all economics tumne IITK se padhi hai. 
[First year ki kuch baate bhul jao saale, har baar mujhe yaad dila dete ho ki tumne ye kaha tha. Mai bhi uss samay seekh hi rha tha bhaiüòÇ]

Alright abhi ke liye vida leta hu. Sincere thanks for the efforts you made in always coming to my room and checking up on me. Tumhe dekhkar humesha hi ek relaxed state mei chala jata tha mai. I wish hum aage bhi touch mei rahein and unlike most ismei mera bhujia khane ka koi swaarth nhi chhipa hai. 
Good bye friend, bhai aka roomie
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Sumukh bhaiiiiiiiiiii
Kya wing mei excitement that tumhare 1st year nukkad ko leke. Aur jab dekhne gye tab tum kab aaye aur chale gye andaza hi nhi laga. Still ek achi photo aa gai.
I will always remember you as someone jisne jee bhar ke marzi wale kaam kiye hain per basic kaam bacha ke rakha i.e. acads. 
Sense of humour to kya gajab ka hai. Kitne hi sad times mei tumne cheer up ker diya hai. Kai baar to bolne ki bhi zarurt nhi padi tumhe. I can clearly recall ki kitne bar maine apne jokes ki validity tumhari hansi ki intensity se cross-check ki hai. So thanks for that. 
Aage ke liye yahi ummeed karunga ki college wala attitude tum zindagi mei bhi kaayam rakho. Full on fun with basics intact. Haa iss baar zindagi mei mat hagna saalee. Partner rakhna. I bet abki mili to tum kabhi nhi chhodege. Zindagi mei kabhi aisa mauka aaye aur uske sath baith ye memoir padho to mujhe bahut satisfaction haasil hoga. 
Apne baal aur apni aawaaz dono sambhal ke rakhna. Taaki jab bhi milu disappoint na hun.
Lots of love bhai!!
Trip karenge saath. Aur har baar jab trip karenge to pichle sentence ko dubara padhenge aur fir trip karenge. 
Tatas!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Hello Sunil bhai
Tumse milke hamesha hi acha lagta tha. Wing ke kitne hi logon ki tumne selflessly help ki hai. Meri bhi kai baar. Zyada baat nhi hui apni but I have always admired you for the hard work you put in, in your tasks. Tumhara progress dekhkar acha lagta hai. 
Thanks for helping me with the cycle har baar.
Best wishes for coming times! Bhulna mat
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Yo Tushar
Kya aadmi ho yaar tum
Koi book likh do bhai. Hall 5 reading room mei rakhwa denge. How to make the best out of IITK theme per. 
Big fan of how you chalked out your own trajectory and built it. Saale college ko ek full fledged club deke jaa rhe ho.
Delhi ke baare mei kya bolun. Kya shaandaar host ho tum. Mera ab bhi aane ka man kerta hai. Kabhi besharam hoke aa jaun to rakh lena. Saath mei aur bhi ghumna hai. 
Aage ke liye all the best bhai. Kuch bada karo bhai jo tumhe satisfaction de. Koi magazine ke cover per aao. I'll be like 'mera dost mera dost'

All the best bhai! Iss baar maine freakonomics poori ker li hai.
Tatas!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Tair sakta hai
Haan
Clean bowled ker sakta hai 
Haan
Gaa sakta hai
Haan
Acting 
-oh yes
Dance
-gaand phad sakta hu.
Here's to my friend and homie Rana aka Utkarsh,
Bhai kya zabardast vibe rehti hai tumhare around. Club coordinator hoke, wo bhi dance club jaisa, GF banake bhi wing nhi chhodi tumne. Truly a man of culture, aye.
Haa ek time per meri bandi tumhare baare mei puchne lagi. Saala zindagi mei pehli baar iss domain mei insecure hua mai. So tumhe to nhi bhulne wala dost.
Jokes apart, kya bindass aadmi ho tum. Jo kerna chahte ho usmein dil nikaal ke rakhe dete ho. How can I forget that 5th sem jab shaam mei intern interview dete the aur fir raat mei dance practice. Saale Antaragni cult meet dono jeeta diya college ko. Aate jaate to sab hain college. Tumne kuch permanent engravings chhod di hain. Very tough shoes to fill in. Respect++

Yaad kerta hu to har baar wo perfect battisi wala chehra hi yaad aata hai tumhara. Aur fir agle hi sec wo gambheer mature face. Ladkiyan ispe hi girti hai naaaa. (One who knows , knowsüòå)

Kuch tumhare future self ke liye chhodke wind up kerta hu. Bhai jitna tumhara potential hai utna self esteem bhi fill in karo bhai( don't want to sound preachy , bas close ho to bol rha) . Palat ke dekho, kitne jhande gaadhe hain. Use hi use karo aane wale challenges ke liye. Maa kasam alag level per macha doge. Jab bhi dual thoughts aaye, yaad ker lena ki some friend wrote this who was with you for 4 years. 
[Election lad lena chahiye tha. wish tab thoda aag bhar deta tumhare andar]

Beherhaal, indirectly kaafi kuch seekha hai tumse bhai. Jitne hi raw ho utne hi accommodating bhi. Glad that we shared the same wing and our paths intersected. 

Lots of love 
Byee bhaii
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
TA202 lab. 
Lol I got confused if it was 201 or 202. Pretty much sums up about the amount of effort we did put in :P
Tumhare kaafi songs maine enjoy kiye hain the ones you shared on Instagram story. Yeah didn't reply to it but did check them out.
Aise hi logon ki lives touch kerte raho.
All the best bhai! And haa of course we'll remain in touch.
author: Manish Chandra Yadav

text:
Yash bhaiii
Bhai likhne mei kya proud wali feeling aa rhi hai.
Optimism ki baadh si aa jaati hai bas tumhare around hone se hi. 
Log bahut conveniently bol dete hain ki problem solver bano naa ki problem dhundhne wale. It ain't easy as we get along. But tumse humesha solution oriented wali hi vibe aayi. No doubt you would be able to deliver some long lasting solutions to problem you find worth solving for.

I liked how we met after a year and could still share the same intimacy while talking. It somewhat assures and relaxes me that no matter how far we live(coz I don't see you sticking to one place seeing your travel plans:P) we will always manage to keep in touch. Rest sorted I hope you'll be a reader all along. Selfish me would have something to extract in every convo we'll have. 
Bindaas raho dost. Jald kahin ghumne chalte hain (treat mei yahi dena padega tumhe, bas khaane se kaam nhi chalne wala). 
Promise to keep in touch. I do on my behalf

Byee bhai!!
author: Manish Chandra Yadav
